nodedef.name: MQTTSource
nodedef.attr: Listens for and receives MQTT messages on a specific topic or topics

datadef.name: Password
datadef.attr: The MD5 encrypted password for the user.

datadef.name: BrokerServer
datadef.attr: The server name or IP for the MQTT broker.

datadef.name: BrokerPort
datadef.attr: The service port for the MQTT broker. The Default is 1883.

datadef.name: DevicePath
datadef.attr: The path of the topic for the device. Enter # to listen to all topics

datadef.name: DeviceId
datadef.attr: The id for the device to listen to. Enter # to listen to all devices on this topic

datadef.name: QOS
datadef.attr: The delivery quality of service for the message.

datadef.name: PersistenceType
datadef.attr: Selects either Memory or File persistence on this client. Default is File and files are written to the VDAB tmp directory.

nodedef.name: MQTTTarget
nodedef.attr: Publishes MQTT messages to a specified topic.

datadef.name: Password
datadef.attr: The MD5 encrypted password for the user.

datadef.name: BrokerServer
datadef.attr: The server name or IP for the MQTT broker.

datadef.name: BrokerPort
datadef.attr: The service port for the MQTT broker. The Default is 1883.

datadef.name: DevicePath
datadef.attr: The path of the topic published to.

datadef.name: DeviceId
datadef.attr: The id for this the publishing device

datadef.name: QOS
datadef.attr: The delivery quality of service for the message.

datadef.name: PersistenceType
datadef.attr: Selects either Memory or File persistence on this client. Default is File and files are written to the VDAB tmp directory.
